players.name: Lionel Messi
players.description: Lionel Andrés Messi is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a forward and captains the Argentina national team.

players.name: Christiano Ronaldo
players.description: Cristiano Ronaldo dos Santos Aveiro GOIH ComM is a Portuguese professional footballer who plays as a forward.

players.name: Paulo Dybala
players.description: Paulo Dybala is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a forward for Serie A club Juventas and the Argentina national team.

players.name: Mesut Ozil
players.description: Mesut Özil is a German professional footballer who plays as an attacking midfielder for Süper Lig club Fenerbahçe.

players.name: Mauro Icardi
players.description: Mauro Emanuel Icardi is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a striker for Ligue 1 club Paris Saint-Germain..

players.name: Angel Di Maria
players.description: Ángel Fabián Di María is an Argentine professional footballer who plays for Ligue 1 club Paris Saint-Germain and the Argentina national team.

players.name: Kylian Mbappe
players.description: Kylian Mbappé Lottin is a French professional footballer who plays as a forward for Ligue 1 club Paris Saint-Germain.

players.name: Mohammad Salah
players.description: Mohamed Salah Hamed Mahrous Ghaly is an Egyptian professional footballer who plays as a forward for Premier League club.

players.name: Harry Kane
players.description: Harry Edward Kane is an English professional footballer who plays as a striker for Premier League club Tottenham Hotspur..

players.name: Kevin De Bruyne
players.description: Kevin De Bruyne is a Belgian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Premier League club Manchester City..

players.name: Philippe Coutinho
players.description: Philippe Coutinho is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as an attacking midfielder for Spanish club Barcelona.

latestNews.title: RMA vs PSG Who Will Win?
latestNews.description: Real Madrid will be looking to join Paris Saint-Germain in the knockout stages of the Champions League when the two teams meet at the Bernabeu on Tuesday night.

latestNews.title: ARS vs FCB Who Will Win?
latestNews.description: Arsenal will be looking to join Bayern Munchen in the knockout stages of the Champions League when the two teams meet at the Bernabeu on Friday night..

latestNews.title: FRA vs POR Who Will Win?
latestNews.description: France will be looking to join Portugal in the knockout stages of the EURO 2020 when the two teams meet at the Bernabeu on Saturday night.
